data.eml:eml: Fourteen new species of Pseudisobrachium (Hymenoptera, Bethylidae) from Atlantic rain forest of Espírito Santo, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Waichert, C., Azevedo, C. O. (2004): Fourteen new species of Pseudisobrachium (Hymenoptera, Bethylidae) from Atlantic rain forest of Espírito Santo, Brazil. Zootaxa 661: 1-22, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.158325
